title: Vincent Cobee to become new head of PSA's Citroen: magazine
text:
Vincent Cobee to become new head of PSA's Citroen: magazine

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 05:01AM ET)

Vincent Cobee to become new head of PSA's Citroen: magazine BERLIN (Reuters) - Vincent Cobee, a former Mitsubishi (T: ) production chief, is set to become the new head at PSA's (PA: ) Citroen unit, German trade magazine Automobilwoche reported on Thursday, citing company sources. The report cited a PSA spokesman as saying that Cobee had already joined the brand's management team. Asked by Reuters, a PSA spokesman declined to comment. Current Citroen CEO Linda Jackson would take on a new role inside the group, the report added. A source in September told Reuters that Cobee was set to make a move to the French carmaker.

Vincent Cobee to become new head of PSA's Citroen: magazine
description: Vincent Cobee to become new head of PSA's Citroen: magazine
